text:
@marktigheST FFS: Co=Corona, vi=virus, d=disease. 19=2019
Covid-19 simply means it was discovered in... wait for it... 2019. There never has been another Cov-1 to Cov-18. Trump press sec Kelly Anne Conway came up with that absurd nonsense first on #FoxNews
